author: Ben Kesslen
title: 'Fine line' to balance economy and coronavirus fight, White House official says
description: The question is, "Can we be laser-focused rather than generic" across the U.S. in the coronavirus fight?, said Dr. Deborah Birx, White House coronavirus response coordinator.
content:
The White House coronavirus response coordinator on Tuesday suggested that "there's a fine line" between balancing the economic needs of Americans and the fight against the pandemic.
